title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When running the Control Example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash unnecessarily. This leads to a distracting user experience.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: When resizing the window in the vertical direction only, the tabs in the TabFolder and Frames should remain stable without any unnecessary flashing.
SR:
1. Launch the Control Example.
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only.
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash unnecessarily.
